SA15n1240:3: yatsattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmīvivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ |
SA15n1240:9: na punaḥ kāraṇagatau kāryyagatau vā kramākramāvasya vyāpakau |
SA15n1240:12: tasmāt kāraṇagatayā kramākramikāryyaviṣayatayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇaśaktiḥ kramākramavyāptetyucyate |
SA15n1240:15: tataśca yadyapi sarvvatra kramākramau sattvasya vyāpakāvityādyucyate |
SA15n1240:22: kaḥ punarasau vyāptiprasādhako vyāpakānupalambha iti cet |
SA15n1240:27: nāsti ca nityābhimatasya bhāvasya kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvamiti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ |
SA15n1240:29: nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvena vyāpakena saha virodhasadbhāvāt,
SA15n1240:30: tathā hi pūrvvāparakālayorekatve nityatvaṃ kṣaṇadvayepi bhede kramākramitvaṃ |
SA15n1240:37: tathā hi na tāvat kramākramābhyāmanyaḥ prakārosti,
SA15n1240:47: tathāhi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi pramāṇasidvatvāt,
SA15n1240:53: pratīti rhi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt |
SA15n1240:54: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ |
SA15n1240:57: antimapakṣe tu na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syāt vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāt |
SA15n1240:58: api ca tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
SA15n1240:67: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati |
SA15n1240:87: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśe ṣāṇi kāryyāṇi kuryyāditi cet |
SA15n1240:94: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet |
SA15n1240:98: atrocyate | satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryyañjanayati na tu tenaiva |
SA15n1240:103: ye hi kāryyamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryyotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kāryye 'nuvarttamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate |
SA15n1240:105: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva karttāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryyaṃ vidadyuḥ |
SA15n1240:107: na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na karttāraḥ svarūpakārakatvanirvvāhaparatayā vyāpārasamāveśāditi ||
SA15n1240:108: kiñca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca satvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatirekopyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ |
SA15n1240:112: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisidviḥ |
SA15n1240:114: kiñca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati nāpyanumānataḥ,
SA15n1240:119: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu brūvata vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati |
SA15n1240:123: api ca kimidaṃ vādhakamakṣaṇikānāmasattāṃ sādha yati,
SA15n1240:131: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā tadvetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikaṃ |
SA15n1240:134: tadā pūrvvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpyo dūṣaṇīyaḥ |
SA15n1240:138: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakya iti |
SA15n1240:146: yathā tuhinadahanayoḥ sāpekṣadhruvabhāvayośca pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt |
SA15n1240:152: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ kālpaniko vā |
SA15n1240:156: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti |
SA15n1240:159: hetoḥ svānubhavasya cākṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo'pi ca |
SA15n1240:160: śūnyaśca dvitīyena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasidvirasatā śakyā kramāderapīti ||
SA15n1240:161: atrocyate | iha vastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭoyathā gavi gotvaṃ,
SA15n1240:163: avastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vakratvābhāvo gagaṇāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi |
SA15n1240:173: yenaiva hi vacanenāvastuno dharmmitvābhāvena dharmmeṇa dharmmatvamabhyupagataṃ |
SA15n1240:175: tathāhyavastuno dharmmitvannāstīti vacanena dharmmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastu vidhīyate,
SA15n1240:182: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāt iti kathamavastuno dharmmitvaniṣedhaḥ |
SA15n1240:185: tathā'vastuno dharmmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso'vastuno dharmmitvasvīkārapūrvvatvena vyāptaḥ |
SA15n1240:190: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanavirodhasidviḥ |
SA15n1240:192: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ pariharttumiti mahati saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ |
SA15n1240:193: avastuprastāve sahṛdayāṇāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet |
SA15n1240:195: avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsarttumicchati |
SA15n1240:196: nacāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamarddanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedvuṃ śakyate |
SA15n1240:197: tataścātrāpi kramākramābhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastyātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmmitvaṃ kena pratihanyate |
SA15n1240:198: trividho hi dharmmo dṛṣṭaḥ kaścidvastuniyato nīlādiḥ |
SA15n1240:207: kevalamasau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratīti rvastvavastunorekarūpā na bhavati |
SA15n1240:211: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratīti ryathāsākṣātpratyakṣaṃ paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo'numānañca |
SA15n1240:214: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo'pi tu vyavaharttavyaḥ |
SA15n1240:218: tataścākṣaṇikasya vikalpamātrasidvatve yaduktaṃ na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syadvikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāditi tatasaṅgataṃ |
SA15n1240:219: vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sambhave'pi vastudharmmeṇa dharmmitvāyogāt |
SA15n1240:236: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyakāraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt |
SA15n1240:240: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti |
SA15n1240:242: yadā tāvadamī mīlitāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu ko ni ṣedvā |
SA15n1240:248: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryyotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat |
SA15n1240:249: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatte rnavā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryyotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati |
SA15n1240:252: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñānadūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasidvidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryyaṃ |
SA15n1240:257: bhavatu tāvannijāgantukabhedena dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tathāpi tatprātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam |
SA15n1240:261: na ca kāryyaṃ sahakāriṇo'pekṣata iti yuktaṃ |
SA15n1240:263: hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryyannakaroti tadā tatkāryyameva tanna syāt,
SA15n1240:272: kiṃ kurmma uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet |
SA15n1240:274: śthiratve'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryyaṃ karotīti cet |
SA15n1240:279: kāryye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet |
SA15n1240:281: sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvamavāryyamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt |
SA15n1240:282: kāryyasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ karttumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati |
SA15n1240:284: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt |
SA15n1240:289: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo'dṛśyatvepyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati |
SA15n1240:290: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ byāptamiti kramākramayoranyo'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ |
SA15n1240:294: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścit vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo'pi tu vikalpādeva vyavaharttavyaḥ |
SA15n1240:296: evaṃ vaidharmmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratītiḥ |
SA15n1240:300: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiñca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāt iti sthitaṃ |
SA15n1240:301: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātrantadā na tasya sādhyabudvijanakatvamavastutvāt |
SA15n1240:302: na cānyopalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhirabhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivat anyasya kasyacidanupalabdheriti cet tadasaṅgataṃ |
SA15n1240:304: yathā neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhirdṛśyānupalabdhiḥ |
SA15n1240:305: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhireva śiṃśapābhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ |
SA15n1240:306: tathā hi nityasya dharmmiṇo vikalpabudvyadhyavasi tasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇameva kramikāritvā kramikāritvānupalambha arthakriyāpekṣayā ca |
SA15n1240:315: ayañca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmmiṇi tathā'vastubhūte'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ |
SA15n1240:319: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmmiṇā sārdvaṃ ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye'pi yadi bhavataḥ |
SA15n1240:320: nityagrāhiṇā jñānena svadharmmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti sambhāvanayā |
SA15n1240:323: yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet |
SA15n1240:327: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryyaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatayā durvvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ |
SA15n1240:338: yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāśca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastuprativadvatvamapi na kṣīṇaṃ |
SA15n1240:339: na ca dvitīye'pi pakṣe doṣaḥ sambhavati |
SA15n1240:343: paryyudāsavṛttyā budvisvabhāva bhūtā kṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmmiṇi prativadvatvasambhavāt |
SA15n1240:344: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ |
SA15n1240:345: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādityādyantarbhāvayituṃ śakyo na tathāyamiti trilocano'pi nirastaḥ |
SA15n1240:355: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisidvau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhakāt pratyakṣādanumānātmakādvā pramāṇāntarāt sidva miti netaretarāśrayatvadoṣaḥ |
SA15n1240:356: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaprasaṅgo bhinna nyāyatvāt |
SA15n1240:361: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmmā heturavastuni vikalpamātrasidve dharmmiṇi nāśrayāsidvidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ |
SA15n1240:369: tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇika svarūpasya tat pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt |
SA15n1240:374: na hi virodhonāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādaṃ sambadvābhidhānamiṣyate'smābhirupapadyate vā |
SA15n1240:379: nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo'yamanayorasaṅkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ |
SA15n1240:382: nanu nityatvakramayaugapadyavattvañca virudvau vidhūya nāparo virodhonāma |
SA15n1240:385: na hi dharmmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ |
SA15n1240:386: kintu virudvayordharmmayoḥ sadbhāve'nyathā virodhanāmadharmmāntarasambhave'pi yadi na virudvau dharmmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasadbhāvaḥ |
SA15n1240:387: virudvau ca dharmmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ |
SA15n1240:391: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo'pi ca |
SA15n1240:392: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattāpi sattāyathā
SA15n1240:401: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikādvinivarttamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva eva viśrāmyante na vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviṃravirodhinī ||
